title: help
body: hey just asking for some tips on how to improve with jax..ive only being playing lol for three months now. but i really like to play with jax in any roll or learn what he good at and not so good at. i mainly play bot lane cos everyone wants top or mid or jg.so please let me know what i can do to improver with jax's on bot lane.. i know he;s not a bot lane..but i want spent time on learning jax for now..until i'm good at playing him. thxs

replies.body: when you got in for a trade, leave up e until you are ready to disengage, when they are stunned, that's when you walk off to safety

Hey man,

I don't play too much Jax but heres a good video - https://youtu.be/5XMHmUilmyc
